metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4218 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s implementation of reading the SVC RDMA counters. Reading the counter sysctl panics the system. This flaw allows a local attacker with local access to cause a denial of service while the system reboots. The issue is specific to CentOS/RHEL.
